The very fact that they investigate crimes shows that a crime has already been committed. If a mugger pulls a knife on you the police will be of no help to you personally.

content: Your first statement is incorrect, as are most of the following statements. Assault weapons produced for sale to American citizens are already regulated. They have many uses and the most popular is probably target shooting. The overwhelming majority of people who legally purchase assault weapons will not kill anyone. If you ban all firearms, people will still use them to commit crimes. Except then, the honest citizens will be completely helpless. Police do not prevent crime. They keep it at bay. The very fact that they investigate crimes shows that a crime has already been committed. If a mugger pulls a knife on you the police will be of no help to you personally.

content: Your first statement is incorrect, as are most of the following statements. Assault weapons produced for sale to American citizens are already regulated. They have many uses and the most popular is probably target shooting. The overwhelming majority of people who legally purchase assault weapons will not kill anyone. If the government trusts me enough to put a machine gun in my hands and send me off to war, it should trust me enough to own a simple firearm. If civilian assault rifles were manufactured only for killing people, we'd have a lot more dead people. Neither civilians, nor the police can "go around killing people". Both however can legally kill criminals who present a direct threat to them and those around them. I've never heard of an "assault weapons" advocate before and people have "settled for semi-automatic firearms" ever since fully automatic weapons were all but banned in the early part of the last century. As far as I know, there has never been a concerted effort to overturn that ban. You still seem to miss the point; criminals are somewhat bad and will do bad things no matter what the laws say. Honest citizens are mostly good and will generally follow the laws. Murder is already against the law, yet people still commit the crime. If you ban all firearms, people will still use them to commit crimes. Except then, the honest citizens will be completely helpless. Police do not prevent crime. They keep it at bay. The very fact that they investigate crimes shows that a crime has already been committed. If a mugger pulls a knife on you the police will be of no help to you personally.
